mapper.sql: SELECT t.id, t.category_id, t.title, t.content, t.cover, t.attribute1, t.notes, t.enabled, t.create_by, t.create_date, t.last_modified_by, t.last_modified_date FROM mdl_article t
mapper.select: SELECT alt.id FROM mdl_article_label_t alt INNER JOIN mdl_article_label_m alm ON alm.label_id=alt.id WHERE alm.article_id=#{id}
SELECT alt.name FROM mdl_article_label_t alt INNER JOIN mdl_article_label_m alm ON alm.label_id=alt.id WHERE alm.article_id=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT t.id, t.category_id, act.`name` AS categoryName, -- (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(alt.`id`) FROM mdl_article_label_t alt INNER JOIN mdl_article_label_m alm ON alm.label_id=alt.id WHERE alm.article_id=t.id) AS labelIds, -- (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(alt.`name`) FROM mdl_article_label_t alt INNER JOIN mdl_article_label_m alm ON alm.label_id=alt.id WHERE alm.article_id=t.id) AS labelNames, t.title, t.content, at.url AS cover, t.attribute1, t.notes, t.enabled, t.create_by, t.create_date, t.last_modified_by, t.last_modified_date, (SELECT 1 FROM mdl_article_comment WHERE article_id=t.id) AS commentCount FROM mdl_article t INNER JOIN mdl_article_category act on act.id = t.category_id LEFT JOIN mdl_attachment at ON at.relation_id = t.id AND at.belongs_to = 'ARTICLE_COVER'

where.if: AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM mdl_article_label_m m WHERE m.article_id=t.id AND m.label_id=#{labelId})

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mdl_article( category_id, title, content, cover, attribute1, notes, enabled, create_by ) VALUES ( #{categoryId}, #{title} , #{content} , #{cover} , #{attribute1} , #{notes} , #{enabled} , #{createBy} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE mdl_article
title = #{title},
content = #{content},
cover = #{cover},
attribute1 = #{attribute1} ,
notes = #{notes} ,
enabled = #{enabled} ,
last_modified_by = #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , last_modified_date = #{lastModifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
